member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateReportCallback.OnOcclusionStateReport
member.summary: Called by the system when the camera occlusion state changes.
member.param: An that can be used to obtain the new camera occlusion state.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateReportCallback
member.summary: Implemented by applications to receive camera occlusion state change notifications.
